30750.name: Bottom of the Northwest Tower
description: The bottom of the northwest tower.  Before you a stone staircase
circles around the base of the tower and into the upper floor above.
The towers of Red Steel are used for the bedrooms of the main guests,
the leaders of each empire in the realms.  The bottom of the towers
are always heavily guarded when guests are around.

30706.name: The {RR{red {RS{rteel {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adwa{&y{7s{x
description: The road follows along the southern end of the Istar Sea, near the
city of Torregiano.  To the south the tall mountains only known as The
Great Mountains split the Tripower's land into two sections.  To the
southeast past the mountains is New Thalos and Zozo.  The road
continues to the east and west.  The Istar sea is to the north.

30752.name: The Northwest Wing
description: The Northwest Wing is a happy cheerful place with grass and trees
around you.  Birds sing and the Sun is shining.  There appears to be
two towers at the ends of this wing.  The cheerful outside seems
ironic considering the possible decisions that could be decided within
this castle's walls.

30799.name: The {RR{red {RS{rteel {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adwa{&y{7s{x
description: The road follows along the southern end of the Istar Sea, near the
city of Torregiano.  To the south the tall mountains only known as The
Great Mountains split the Tripower's land into two sections.  To the
southeast past the mountains is New Thalos and Zozo.  The road
continues to the east and west.  The Istar sea is to the north.

30798.name: The {RR{red {RS{rteel {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adwa{&y{7s{x
description: The road follows along the southern end of the Istar Sea, near the
city of Torregiano.  To the south the tall mountains only known as The
Great Mountains split the Tripower's land into two sections.  To the
southeast past the mountains is New Thalos and Zozo.  The road
continues to the east and west.  The Istar sea is to the north.

30703.name: The {RR{red {RS{rteel {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adwa{&y{7s{x
description: The road follows along the southern end of the Istar Sea, near the
city of Torregiano.  To the south the tall mountains only known as The
Great Mountains split the Tripower's land into two sections.  To the
southeast past the mountains is New Thalos and Zozo.  The road
continues to the east and west.  The Istar sea is to the north.

30726.name: The Southwest Wing
description: The Southwest Wing is filled with lively motion and a feeling of anticipation.
The smells of tonight's dinner wafts in the air as waiters are running down the halls
with plates of food entering the dinning room.

30768.name: The Main Corridor
description: Two doors appear on either side of the hallway.  The arched hallway
continues to the east, and the main doors to the west.  The sides of
the walls are covered with paintings and priceless items.

30737.name: The Northwest Wing
description: The Northwest Wing is a happy cheerful place with grass and trees
around you.  Birds sing and the Sun is shining.  There appears to be
two towers at the ends of this wing.  The cheerful outside seems
ironic considering the possible decisions that could be decided within
this castle's walls.

30751.name: The Courtyard [NW]
description: Before you a lush garden stands.  Many trees cover the top of the
area, and give shade all around.  The grass is cut low and well
groomed.  Vines climb the sides of the castle that surrounds to the
north, east and south.

30794.name: The Southeast Tower Bedroom
description: Before you stands the Tower Bedroom, the sleeping area of Empire
Leaders.  Four windows look out over the realms at each compass point,
and a large bed stands in the center of the room.  The surrounding
walls are covered with paintings and curtains.  Large dressers and
vanity tables stand along the walls too.  A large desk used by the
leaders stands in front of one of the windows.

30727.name: The Southwest Wing
description: The Southwest Wing is filled with lively motion and a feeling of anticipation.
The smells of tonight's dinner wafts in the air as waiters are running down the halls
with plates of food entering the dinning room.

30787.name: The Kitchen [NW]
description: V The Large Kitchen of Caste Red Steel is here filled with
wonderful smells of food for the events planned at the meeting.  Many
cooks and bus boys are taking food to the dining room in the Southwest
Wing of the castle.

30758.name: The Meeting Hall Of The Gods [W]
description: The Meeting Hall of the Gods surrounds the most important room in
the castle the Gathering Spot.  These walls are covered in gold and
shine with all the wealth and power that is fitting for the decisions
and the people that go through these halls.

30735.name: The Southwest Wing
description: The Southwest Wing is filled with lively motion and a feeling of anticipation.
The smells of tonight's dinner wafts in the air as waiters are running down the halls
with plates of food entering the dinning room.

30740.name: Guest Bedroom
description: The guest bedroom is large, and full of furniture.  A large canopy
bed sits against the far wall, a nice rug under it.  A large dresser
stands to one side, and another table with a mirror on the other.  The
walls are decked out with curtains and paintings.  The ceiling is a
high arch, well painted.

30769.name: The Main Corridor
description: The castle stands before you, a tall archway hallway leads east
down into the belly of the castle.  The hallway goes thirteen feet up
into the air and into an arch, and the ceiling is painted and
encrusted with jewels.  Paintings and suits of armor line the sides of
the hall.

30777.name: Bottom of the Northeast Tower
description: The bottom of the northeast tower.  Before you a stone staircase
circles around the base of the tower and into the upper floor above.
The towers of Red Steel are used for the bedrooms of the main guests,
the leaders of each empire in the realms.  The bottom of the towers
are always heavily guarded when guests are around.

30728.name: The Courtyard [SE]
description: Before you a lush garden stands.  Many trees cover the top of the
area, and give shade all around.  The grass is cut low and well
groomed.  Vines climb the sides of the castle that surrounds to the
north, east and south.

30734.name: The Northwest Wing
description: The Northwest Wing is a happy cheerful place with grass and trees
around you.  Birds sing and the Sun is shining.  There appears to be
two towers at the ends of this wing.  The cheerful outside seems
ironic considering the possible decisions that could be decided within
this castle's walls.

30771.name: The Ballroom
description: The BallRoom is a large vast hall with pictures and tapestries
hanging on the walls.  A piano sits in the corner with a small woman
sitting at it.  Her sobbing can be heard from across the room.  It
appears that she may have been drinking as many empty bottles of wine
lay around her.

30739.name: The Main Corridor
description: To the east two large doors that take up the entire 13 feet tall
hallway lead to the east.  The latches on the door is a large gold
ring, and the doors seem to have a faint glow to them.

30784.name: The Southeast Wing
description: The Library of Castle Red Steel stands with walls Larger than a house all filled with books.
These books no doubtable are from around the world and from ancient times as well.
Some of the books Catch Your Eye... "The History of the Great Realms" is here
In It's Entirety!!! Along with many large reading tables.
Please Be Silet Unless Askign For A Book

30730.name: The Courtyard [NE]
description: Before you a lush garden stands.  Many trees cover the top of the
area, and give shade all around.  The grass is cut low and well
groomed.  Vines climb the sides of the castle that surrounds to the
north, east and south.

30741.name: The Southwest Wing
description: The Southwest Wing is filled with lively motion and a feeling of anticipation.
The smells of tonight's dinner wafts in the air as waiters are running down the halls
with plates of food entering the dinning room.

30742.name: The Southwest Wing
description: The Southwest Wing is filled with lively motion and a feeling of anticipation.

high arch, well painted.

30789.name: The Kitchen [E]
description: The Main part of this magnificent kitchen stands in all its glory.
The head chef stands at his burner working on tonight's main dish a
large rare Carnassid.  Aside from the awe that hits you from the sight
of all the chefs and a kitchen for the gods your hit even harder by
your will to sit down and eat of the master's creation

30791.name: The Kitchen [SE]
description: The Large Kitchen of Caste Red Steel is here filled with wonderful smells

30764.name: The Meeting Hall Of The Gods [NE]

power that is fitting for the decisions and the people that go through these halls.

30774.name: The Northeast Wing
description: The Northeast Wing if filled with music as a Piano plays down the
hall.  The melody is melancholy and almost gives off a feeling of
sadness.  These Hall although as grand as the rest of the Castle are
void of people.

30792.name: Northeast Tower Bedroom
description: Before you stands the Tower Bedroom, the sleeping area of Empire

30718.name: South Istar Road
description: The road continues on its east and western path.  To the east a
large castle can be seen, two large towers out in front of the gates
keep watch.  To the south is the Great Mountains, and to the north is
the Istar Sea.

30778.name: The Southeast Wing
description: The Southeast wing is filled with a sense of knowledge.  Wisdom and Intellect flow
around you as if they were water. You know that any area such as this should have
a fabulous Library if you could only find it. The Large walls and
Dim Lighting give off a very quiet environment.

hall.  The melody is melancholy and almost gives off a feeling of

void of people.

30766.name: The Gathering Spot
description: The Gathering Spot.  You're standing at one of the most important
positions in the realms.  A huge table is set in the middle of this
huge room.  The arched ceiling has painting of the great Elven and Orc
battle of olden times.  Pixies fly around the room passing note from
other diplomats to other diplomats.  The room is filled with the
commotion preparing for the meeting.

30732.name: Dining Hall
description: You enter a fabulous room with several busy waiters running around the large table.
The waiters are setting places for the many guests present tonight.  The walls are covered
in gold and red trim with a very plush red carpet under foot.

30753.name: The Northwest Wing
description: The Northwest Wing is a happy cheerful place with grass and trees
around you.  Birds sing and the Sun is shining.  There appears to be
two towers at the ends of this wing.  The cheerful outside seems
ironic considering the possible decisions that could be decided within
this castle's walls.

30754.name: Inside The Tower
description: You are in one of the guard towers that guards the road going into
the Red Steel.  A staircase leads upwards.

30782.name: The Southeast Wing
description: The Southeast wing is filled with a sense of knowledge.  Wisdom and Intellect flow
around you as if they were water. You know that any area such as this should have

30723.name: The Courtyard [W]
description: Before you a lush garden stands.  Many trees cover the top of the
area, and give shade all around.  The grass is cut low and well
groomed.  Vines climb the sides of the castle that surrounds to the
north, east and south.  A large fountain stands in front of the main
doors, to the east.  To the west a pair of large gates stand, leading
out of Red Steel.

30744.name: Guest Bedroom
description: The guest bedroom is large, and full of furniture.  A large canopy
bed sits against the far wall, a nice rug under it.  A large dresser
stands to one side, and another table with a mirror on the other.  The
walls are decked out with curtains and paintings.  The ceiling is a
high arch, well painted.

30785.name: A Secret Passageway
description: You are in total darkness after you enter the secret hallway.  A
little hole lets you see into the main corridor.

30776.name: The Northeast Wing
description: The Northeast Wing if filled with music as a Piano plays down the

void of people.

30729.name: The Courtyard [E]
description: To the east a pair of large doors stands before you.  All around
the lush garden of Red Steel surrounds you, the trees stand tall
creating a canopy.  The grass is cut low, and a large fountain stands
here pouring clean cool water.  The doors into the castle are to the
east.

30722.name: The Courtyard [SW]
description: Before you a lush garden stands.  Many trees cover the top of the
area, and give shade all around.  The grass is cut low and well
groomed.  Vines climb the sides of the castle that surrounds to the
north, east and south.

30790.name: The Kitchen [NE]
description: The Large Kitchen of Caste Red Steel is here filled with wonderful smells
of food for the events planned at the meeting.  Many cooks and bus boys
are taking food to the dining room in the Southwest Wing of the castle.

30720.name: The Gates of Red Steel
description: The wall opens up into the gate area.  High above you the gate
stands drawn upwards, along with two other gates.  The structure goes
half way up the tower walls, which is north and south.  To the east a
large lush courtyard can be seen, with people walking around.  Also a
massive red building stands to the east.

30704.name: {CT{che {CS{cad {CC{crying {CW{coman{9~
description:
Her name is forgotten to her love
her tears are cold...
and her heart is lost
30704.room_name: A woman sits at the piano playing as she crys

Hurry Hurry Hurry 
get that message to that person and this one to ..
oh bother ... Hurry Hurry Hurry
